help-file.title: REIMBURSEMENT
help-file.content:
We now only grant reimbursements for corrupt player files or a bug that causes complete equipment loss on multiple characters. There will be NO EXCEPTIONS.
We will NOT grant reimbursements for fumbled weapons, lost or stolen items, decayed corpses, hacked accounts, changes to the game, things lost during a crash or reboot, or anything that does not fall under the above two exceptions.
